blog.name: kingdomofkitten
blog.title: Jacob A.K.A. KingdomOfKitten
blog.description:
I write sometimes. I think that says a lot about my career choices.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/KingdomOfKitten

My Letterboxd: https://letterboxd.com/kingdomofkitten/

title: Two Small Questions
body:
1. So, recently, Tumblr has been having some…….hiccups, let’s call it. Apparently some child pornography had been found on the site, and porn bots were (well, ARE) spamming the shit out of several posts, which led to a combination of the app being removed from the Apple app store, and Tumblr trying to surveillance the situation, by having bots go in, and take down several NSFW blogs…..that included several notable artists, who had their blogs taken down, even if they hadn’t done anything wrong.

(It actually convinced me to quickly take down a stupid Cuphead related post I made, because it happened to have NSFW in the tags. Not like anyone saw it, so win-win! :D)

With that, apparently there has been an exodus of various users to sites such as Newgrounds, or @pillowfort-io, the latter of which is currently down, due to security measures. Newgrounds, I PROBABLY won’t go to, given that I’m more of a writing kinda guy, and as far as I can tell, they don’t really have anything for that (except for maybe community forums :P). But if I decide to kinda jump ship to some other site (like the aforementioned @pillowfort-io, or something like that), and continue posting some of my stories there, as well as re-upload my older stuff, be honest here, how many of you would be willing to jump ship and follow me on said platforms? Again, be honest here. If you don’t feel like you would, say so, I don’t mind. 

For the record, at this moment, I don’t feel the need to abandon Tumblr. So you don’t have to worry about me suddenly deciding to stop writing on here. But in the event of it happening, I just am curious on who would come around to it.

2. I said a little while back, that I plan on starting, very soon, the wedding story arc. A few parts to it, simple as can be. However, something I was legitimately considering, was commissioning some art for it. I don’t know if that would take the form of, I was thinking just a wedding photo, with a bunch of people in it? In any case, I was wondering, who would be a good artist for that? Someone who can really do a good piece like that idea? Lemme know, I’m curious.

Just because I feel like these two questions are things I want multiple opinions on, here are some mentions:

@firecraker-j @silentmike​ @yoshifan30 @the-little-ship

tags: I love the anime and I am living Retsuko’s life
Living the ‘hate my job but i have to work it until something better happens’ life
summary: I just started up on Aggretsuko, how do you feel about the series and do you relate to Retsuko or nah?
question: I just started up on Aggretsuko, how do you feel about the series and do you relate to Retsuko or nah?
answer:
I relate 1000% to Retsuko. She is me in anime form.

Fiancée and I watched it together and he just turned and said “I never thought I’d get to see you, to a T, in anime form.”


And hoo boy… GUILTY.

reblog.comment:

And hoo boy… GUILTY.

summary: Man it has been forever since I drew art of Aggretsuko. This was something I drew for someone on the Aggretsuko amino as part of...
caption:
Man it has been forever since I drew art of Aggretsuko. This was something I drew for someone on the Aggretsuko amino as part of an art trade. I hardly ever draw these two but I am pleased with how this came out.

Also I ship these two a lot
